meanings.definition: A branch or offshoot of a plant.
meanings.sent1: The ramis of the tree reached out towards the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: I found a small ramis growing from the main stem of the plant.
meanings.sent3: The ramis of the flower seemed to wave at me in the breeze.
meanings.sent4: The ramis of the vine intertwined with the branches of the nearby tree.
meanings.sent5: The ramis of the bush was covered in vibrant green leaves.

meanings.definition: To branch out or spread in different directions.
meanings.sent1: The river ramis into smaller streams as it flows through the valley.
meanings.sent2: Plants tend to ramis in search of more sunlight.
meanings.sent3: I watched the cracks in the wall ramis like tiny spiderwebs.
meanings.sent4: His ideas began to ramis and evolve into a comprehensive plan.
meanings.sent5: The rumors started to ramis throughout the small town.
